hero.name: Ezzat Al-Sayed
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.description: I design and code beautifully simple things, and I love what I do. I specialize in creating modern, responsive websites with a focus on user experience and clean code.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a passionate frontend developer with a knack for creating elegant and effective user interfaces. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I bring ideas to life in the browser. I am constantly learning and adapting to new technologies to deliver the best possible web experiences.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer - Freelance
responsibilities: Developed and maintained responsive websites for various clients.
Collaborated with designers to create seamless user experiences.
Implemented modern frontend frameworks and libraries.

education.title: Education & Certifications
education.institution: The Higher Institute of E-Commerce and Information Systems
education.description: Bachelor's degree in Management Information Systems (MIS).
